description:
Ever since the launch of the Steam Deck we've seen a ton of a handheld PCs launch and even some new devices specifically targeting Linux, and one company has been spending a lot of money on the space even though there's a bit of drama surrounding it.

title: Playtron And The Rise Of Linux Handhelds
